tracks.text: A flaming phoenix logo and the word Kadokawa reflect in water.
Zenberu wields an axe in front of the Dragon Claw tribe.
Yusu stares
Crush blushes
She hides her face
Her tail wags
He lifts frostpane. It resembles a chunky fork made of sharpened, frosty glass.
Zenberu swings his axe. Yusu dodges backwards, then swings. Zenberu blocks with the pole of his axe.
Zenberu pushes Yusu back. He slides, then lunges.
Zenberu swings. Yusu blocks. Yusu swings. Zenberu blocks. Yusu swings. Zenberu's axe goes flying.
Yusu pushes. Zenberu stumbles then smiles. Yusu startles. Blood splatters. Crush gapes. The axe lands. Yusu puts a hand to the bleeding scratches on his cheek.
Zenberu charges, fist ready
His hand glows. Yusu blocks with frostpane, then jumps back.
He licks Yusu's blood off his claws.
Missing finger
He kicks with a glowing foot
The crowd cheers. Crush clasps her hands.
Ains holds a golden staff. Albedo stares. Shalltear glances. The elf twins raise their heads. Demiurge smiles. Cocytus turns. Sebas stares. Ains's eye burns red.
An army of lizard men march under dark clouds.
Text, Overlord 2
Yusu walks, carrying Frostpane. Shasuryu and Zenberu walk with him.
Cocytus marches, carrying an axe. An army of skeletons with swords marches behind him.
A man with tattoos walks. 5 other adventurers walk behind him.
5 blond adventurer women walk. One wears a blue rose.
Climb, Brain, and Gazef walk.
Masked blonde women, one in black and one in white, stand back to back, spinning around.
Ains walks towards the horizon. Albedo, Shalltear, the twins, Demiurge, Cocytus, and Sebas join him.
Ains stops and looks back.
Maids drop from the sky: Yuri Alpha, Lupusregina Beta, Narberal Gamma, Solution Epsilon, a maid in an eyepatch, and an insectoid maid.
The tattooed man punches at Sebas, who evades.
Yusu charges through the marsh, wielding frostpane. He leaps and swings at Cocytus.
Climb wears shining armor and holds a sword.
A blond female adventurer in a cloak and mask flies. Blue shards fire around her and land near the insectoid maid.
Demiurge wears a mask and deflects Momon's long swords. Behind the pair, the city burns.
Princess Renner smiles at us from the castle.
Crush Lulu smiles at us from a village with white and yellow huts.
A blond and blue eyed maid smiles from a field a daisies.
Shalltear looks up at a galaxy. Albedo stares lustfully. Ains sits on a throne under the flag of Ains Ooal Gown.

People turn to us from the shadows: Climb, Gazef, Brain, Renner, blond men, a woman wearing a blue rose, a warrior woman, 2 ninja women, a woman in a mask, Zenberu, Shasuryu, a floating brain, a golem, the fungus bartender, Pestonya, and Eclair
Text, Chapter 3, Lizard men, gathering
Zenberu punches. Yusu deflects with frostpane.
Zenberu swings his fists. He presses Yusu back.
Zenberu kicks. Yusu side steps and gets behind him.
As Zenberu punches frostpane, it glows. Frost forms over Zenberu's fists.
Yusu blocks a punch and pushes back.
Zenberu stumbles back. Both pant.
Zenberu flinches at his frozen hand.
Yusu straightens and slowly lowers Frostpane.
Crush steps forward.
A magic circle forms between her hands. Yusu glows.
A bonfire crackles under the night sky
Without her shrubbery, Crush walks past the fire and drinking lizard men.
A hydra head raises and she pets it.
Yusu glances at her and sips. Zenberu drinks.
She blushes. He stares. Zenberu averts his eyes and drinks more sake from a bowl the size of his head.
The hydra walks across the marsh.
Workers prepare sharpened pikes. Logs are stacked near a lookout tower and a dirt mound.
The hydra leans down and Shasuryu pets a head. Leafy Crush leaps down.
She hits his tail with hers
Sukyu Juju
Kyuku Zuzu

In an elaborate building under construction in the woods, Cocytus, the insectoid maid, and 4 others watch a floating mirror. It depicts the lizard men preparing battlements in the Razor Tail Tribe. Cocytus tosses a scroll.
The insectoid maid stares. In a hotel room, Nabe watches Ains.
The warriors stand along the fortifications. They gape as a dark cloud forms over the marsh in front of them.
Skeletons shuffle forward, wielding swords and scythes.
Wind blows at a burning torch.
Shasuryu address the army.
Lizard men charge
Skeletons charge
Tall, robed zombies shuffle forward.
The armies close the gap
A lizard man swings, shattering a skeleton. And another.
The armies fight fight in close quarters.
Skeleton cavalry ride through the melee, holding spears.
A skeleton horse trips in a pot, buried in the marsh. Its leg breaks. The cavalrymen drop to the ground.
Sling shots fire, breaking skulls
More cavalrymen fall.
A cloud of bone arrows arcs through the air.
Arrows land in the lizard men
Skeleton archers loose another volley.
Warriors run, shielding their heads with their hands
Zombie dogs race through the melee
They lunge at warriors' necks.
A zombie boar races across the marsh, spearing warriors with its tusks.
A zombie bear towers over the lizard men and swipes.
Magic circles form near the fort. Water swirls into a tower. A ribbon of muddy water peels off from the tower and wraps around the zombie boar and a zombie wolf.
The ribbons rip the wolf in half.
She looks back at priests in a circle.
Their tails twist together. The hydra and chiefs stare.
Cocytus watches from the mirror.
He glances at the maid, Entoma, who eats a snack.
Entoma glances
In a yurt
A talisman falls from Entoma's face
He tosses another scroll.
Lizard men mop up
A fire ball flies past the warrior.
The swamp elementals dissipate
The warrior turns and looks across the marsh. A shadow emerges from the mist. A haggard undead wearing a cloak. It lifts a finger and shoots another fireball.
Warriors explode in a ball of fire
The lich smiles. The chiefs stare. Lich fires. A warriors burns.
A second and third burn
The chiefs stare at 4 plumes of smoke
Yusu turns to Rororo and pets a head
The hydra gallops across the marsh.
The lich fires. An explosion consumes Rororo.
Its faces, necks, and chest burn. The hydra continues to charge.
He fires again and again.
The lich fires
Yusu leaps off Rororo's back. Symbols appear on frostpane.
A wall of ice rises from the marsh. The hell fire strikes. Steam fills our view.
The lich gapes. The hydra collapses. Zenberu and Crush leap down.
Lich fires
The 3 run through the steam.
Zenberu tanks the bolt.
He glows red
Armed skeletons rise from the marsh
Zenberu leaps and punches
Yusu charges. Zenberu punches a spearman
A dark aura surrounds Yusu
He looks around, floating in an endless void
His heart glows, and the aura fades.
Yusu charges the lich, swinging frostpane
Needles fire from his chest. Yusu blocks.
Crush lies in the mud. She struggles to raise her head.
Zenbeur punches a skull off its spine.
He collapses. Yusu glances. A needle strikes his cheek.
He swings, the lich floats around
The lich gets behind and fires into Yusu's back.
Yusu glows
Yusu swings. The lich stumbles back.
He glances at Crush and Zenberu, then thrusts Frostpane into the marsh.
A blizzard swirls around him and the lich. It rises higher, expanding wider
Frost covers Yusu's arms and legs
The hell fire goes out
He looks around the frosty mist. Yusu descends on it and pierces its eye
The lich grabs Yusu's neck. Its arms glow red.
Yusu closes his eyes
He opens his eyes
He brings a fist down on frostpane. Blood geysers out of the back of the lich's head.
Its eyes dim.
The lich dissipates. Frostpane drops to the ice coated marsh.
Yusu stares, then falls back.
In the village, warriors, children, and priests celebrate.
A series of stylized portraits with animated lighting. Black feathers float up from Albedo's oustretched wings.

Crush Lulu sits on a ground of cracked ice. She's surrounded by a thicket of spears. A lizard men army marches behind her. A light from above shines down on frostpane, lying on the ground. Crush is an albino lizard with red tattoos around her neck and limbs. She wears an orange shawl aroun her shoulders.
Princess Renner clasps her hands, smiling, eyes closed. Over her shoulder, Climb stands in shadow, facing away from us.
Her image flickers and darkens. She smiles at us with vacant eyes and holds a sword resembling a wire of blood. It cuts across Climb's throat.
A blond, blue eyed woman wears a simple white dress. She takes the hand of a figure in shadow.

A blond woman wearing a mask and red cloak crosses her arms. She wears red beads around her wrist. A sword stands at her back. Opposite the sword is a blond woman, looking down, wearing red beads around her wrist.

Petals drift from a red rose. Thorns twist out from the rose, entwining the horns coming out of Albedo's head. More thorns wrap around her pale arms. Her black wings stretch out, feathers floating around.
Black fluid drips from between Albedo's fingers. She holds out her hands and stares at us with her yellow eyes.
White out
